players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie, I'm concerned about your silence last night. What do you have to say for yourself?"
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide, Alice. I was simply deep in thought last night."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide, I was deep in thought last night."
Bob: "Charlie, you're a terrible liar. I've seen better acting from a kindergarten student."
You: "Charlie, I think you're hiding something. Bob, your sarcasm is distracting from the real issue at hand."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
